data.actual_result: Virtualized flash won't work without the expanding the camera
data.expected_result: Virtualized flash will work without the need to expand the camera
data.short_description: Virtualized flash works ONLY when expanding the camera
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure your device supports Virtual flash on front-facing camera - Press to add attachment  - Go to "take a photo" section  - Try to use flash on front camera WITHOUT expanding the camera - Observe  - Now try step 4 but with EXPANDING the camera and observe
